attributes.review: If I could rate this app half or zero stars I would.  I can’t believe people are so idiotic to listen to this nonsense for this long! From the biased news to just hearing trump speak is disgusting. I will not stand for a rapist and a man who lies about being a Christian.. voting against him will NOT lead to a socialist society! Voting against him for 2020 will lead to a president with more morals and education than this man will ever have! Anyone but trump (and Kanye) for 2020!!
attributes.title: Worst App Ever!

attributes.review:
I honestly DESPISE this app, and I’ll tell you why. 

1 - This is an awful app, it’s ridiculously glitchy and I can’t even keep it open without it crashing. As an app for the president I wouldn’t even want it. Like the president is bad but this app is just... whew.

2 - I find it annoying that I have to enter my phone number. By doing so the app has access to my location through my phone number and I don’t need no stalkers. ✨

3 - This app is a complete waste of time, I mean the purpose is there but it’s just not worth any time to be spent on it.

Overall Rating - 0/10 should in-fact be removed from the App Store. ✨💕
attributes.title: Doesn’t work correctly.

attributes.review: this app made my phone glitch i got 67 virus and my phone is now broken, this app went into all of my privacy things deleted all my photos went on all my social media’s and posted thing to make me seem like a very bad person over all PLEASE DO NOT GET THIS APP, my coworker peaches said that her nudes got sent to all her platforms please don’t not get this app !!

attributes.review: When I first opened the app it immediately started yelling racial slurs at me! Insane! After it was done being a little racist troll, it ran to the nearest pawn shop and purchased an AR15. Then, it shot me multiple times in the leg and called the cops on ME! It accused me of smuggling drugs and when the cops cane they didn’t even ask any question. I am now writing this from my jail cell. Horrible app!
